00020 #define NDARRAY_MAKE_VECTOR_ARG_SPEC(Z,I,DATA) T v ## I
00021 #define NDARRAY_MAKE_VECTOR_SET_SPEC(Z,I,DATA) r[I] = v ## I;
00022 
00023 #define NDARRAY_MAKE_VECTOR_SPEC(Z,N,DATA)                      \
00024     template <typename T>                                       \
00025     inline Vector<T,N> makeVector(                              \
00026         BOOST_PP_ENUM(N,NDARRAY_MAKE_VECTOR_ARG_SPEC,unused)    \
00027     ) {                                                         \
00028         Vector<T,N> r;                                          \
00029         BOOST_PP_REPEAT(N,NDARRAY_MAKE_VECTOR_SET_SPEC,unused)  \
00030         return r;                                               \
00031     }

00113     template <int Start, int Stop>
00114     Vector<T,Stop-Start> getRange() const {
00115         Vector<T,Stop-Start> r;
00116         std::copy(begin() + Start, begin()+Stop, r.begin());
00117         return r;
00118     }

00121     template <int M> Vector<T,M> first() const {
00122         Vector<T,M> r;
00123         std::copy(begin(), begin() + M, r.begin());
00124         return r;
00125     }

00128     template <int M> Vector<T,M> last() const {
00129         Vector<T,M> r;
00130         std::copy(begin() + (N - M), begin() + N, r.begin());
00131         return r;

00171     T sum() const {
00172         T r = 0;
00173         for (ConstIterator i = begin(); i != end(); ++i) r += (*i);
00174         return r;

00398     bool empty() const { return true; }            
00399 
00400     iterator begin() { return 0; }

00412     reverse_iterator rend() { return reverse_iterator(); }
00414     const_reverse_iterator rend() const { return const_reverse_iterator(); }
00415 
00417     reference front() { NDARRAY_ASSERT(false); return 0; }
00419     reference back() { return NDARRAY_ASSERT(false); return 0; }

00423     const_reference back() const { NDARRAY_ASSERT(false); return 0; }

00485 template <typename T, int N, int M>
00486 inline Vector<T,N+M> concatenate(Vector<T,N> const & a, Vector<T,M> const & b) {
00487     Vector<T,N+M> r;
00488     std::copy(a.begin(),a.end(),r.begin());
00489     std::copy(b.begin(),b.end(),r.begin()+N);
00490     return r;
00491 }
00492 
00494 template <typename T, int N>
00495 inline Vector<T,N+1> concatenate(Vector<T,N> const & a, T const & b) {
00496     Vector<T,N+1> r;
00497     std::copy(a.begin(),a.end(),r.begin());
00498     r[N] = b;
00499     return r;
00500 }
00501 
00503 template <typename T, int N>
00504 inline Vector<T,N+1> concatenate(T const & a, Vector<T,N> const & b) {
00505     Vector<T,N+1> r;
00506     r[0] = a;
00507     std::copy(b.begin(),b.end(),r.begin()+1);
00508     return r;
00509 }

00524 template <typename T, int N>
00525 inline Vector<T,N> operator~(Vector<T,N> const & vector) {
00526     Vector<T,N> r(vector);
00527     for (typename Vector<T,N>::Iterator i = r.begin(); i != r.end(); ++i) (*i) = ~(*i);
00528     return r;    
00529 }

00710     Vector<typename Promote<T,U>::Type,N>
00711     operator |(U a, Vector<T,N> const & b) {
00712         Vector<typename Promote<T,U>::Type,N> r(a);
00713         return r |= b;
00714     }

00721         return r <<= b;
